description.narrative: Efficient and Accountable Local Governance strengthen the capacities of local governments and other stakeholders to foster participatory local development service delivery for the susatainable development goals.

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: 1.1.1 – Approved ToR 1.1.2 – UZP service delivery tools 1.1.3 – Circular issued for UZP core staff 1.1.4 – Circular for allowance 1.1.5 - % of initiatives on SDG localization 1.1.6 - % of UZP coordinate with District development committee 1.1.7 - % of UZP schemes managed in participatory manner 1.1.8 - % of UZP published plan book/annual report 1.2.1 – Number of PFM 1.2.3 - % of UZP timely publish budget 1.2.4 – Number of people receive IGA training 1.3.1 - UZP Act amended 1.3.2 - Open Budget and participatory Planning mechanisms piloted, adapted and replicated in UZP Act 1.3.3 - UZPs have active Facebook and Twitter accounts 1.3.4 - % of citizens in the selected UZPs are aware of UZP activities 1.4.1 - Percentage of women vice-chair and councillor trained 1.4.2 - % of UZP schemes implemented under the leadership of women 1.4.3 - Number of youth and women received training 2.1.1 - of targeted UPs have operational Standing Commitees 2.1.2 - % of targeted UPs with increased participation of women and marginalized citizen in Ward Shava and Open Budget 2.2.1 - % of climate vulnerable UPs with climate resilient measures integrated into their five-year development plan 2.3.1 - % of women and margilized citizens taking part in Ward Shava / Election 2.3.2 - % of budget allocation for participation of marginalized citizens and women in development initiatives 2.4.1 - Number of measures issued by LGD 3.1.1 - Detailed options for division of responsibilities among LGI tiers are available 3.1.2 - Ways and mechanisms of integration and supplementation of UZP plans and transferred departments are identified 3.1.3 - An integrated planning system of UP, UZP and ZP is developed 3.1.4 - Review of the existing tax collection system of the UP is complete 3.2.1 - Dialogues with political parties and policy makers are held 3.2.2 -
